Thank you for completing the Covid19 Bot.  

For the most up to date information on the Coronavirus, please check out https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-nCoV/summary.html

At this time, I'm going to pass you off to the Review of Symptoms Triage Bot for further triage of your symptoms.

Due to unusually high demand, I am unable to hand you off to a Triage Nurse immediately. Your information has been captured in the call back list and you will be called back by the end of the day or sooner depending on urgency.  

Please exercise appropriate precautions while interacting with others until you have spoken to the Doctor or Triage Nurse.

they developed common cold symptoms?","variable":"cold_symptoms","label":"Cold","stringId":"stringId_d76edb12dd5c2cdc","choiceType":"choice"},{"id":"b8df9c2b489d-095cc1bd0fcaafd5-9855","type":"action","label":"Action","designer":{"xLocation":268,"yLocation":220,"next":"a20d2fc3cc72-6d5e11d9a7513166-1172"},"onInit":"/*
 * Use the following variable notation:
 * 
 * scenario.var = scenario local variables
 * user.var = user data variables
 * conversation.var = global conversation variables
 * 
 * Available object to use in the code:
 * require, session, moment, builder, next(), underscore
 * 
 * Hit 'Ctrl + Space' for autocomplete
 * 
 * Example: scenario.welcomeMessage = "Hello " + scenario.name
*/

${age} = ${scenarioArgs}.Age

if (scenario.difficulty_breathing.index === 0)
    { ${complaint} = "Difficulty Breathing",
    scenario.ros = true;}
else if (scenario.cough.index === 0)
    { ${complaint} = "Cough",
    scenario.ros = true;}
else if (scenario.cold_symptoms.index === 0)
    { ${complaint} = "Cold Symptoms",
    scenario.ros = true;}
else
    { ${complaint} = " ",
    scenario.ros = false;}

${Text} = 'Here is what we have collected thus far '
${QuestionnaireSummary} = 
'\n ' +
'\n Contact Name: ' + ${scenarioArgs}.Username +
'\n Contact Number: ' + ${scenarioArgs}.Callback +
'\n Inquiring For: ' + ${scenarioArgs}.LovedFirst + ' ' + ${scenarioArgs}.LovedLast +
'\n Their Age: '+ ${scenarioArgs}.Age +
'\n Difficulty in Breathing: ' + ${difficulty_breathing}.entity +
'\n Have Developed a Cough: ' + ${cough}.entity +
'\n Have Developed other Cold Symptoms: ' + ${cold_symptoms}.entity +
'\n Traveled to an at risk location recently: ' + ${travel}.entity +
